It has been fetching $1,695 at full price since hitting Amazon’s marketplace back at the top of October, with only two previous discounts on the books going as low as $1,395, which we saw back in November during Black Friday sales. Picking it up here gives you the second-best price we have tracked at Amazon, saving you $250 and landing it just $50 above its low at this marketplace.
